attributes.action: Attend an interview with Russell Brand to discuss the glorious revolution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Russell Brand is on the verge of overtaking the world with his revolution, and has been calling on Prime Minister Gordon Brown to accept the challenge to meet him for an interview.

It is vital that the current Prime Minister meet with our future leader to plan the details of the overthrow of society.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
